document_data.mainbody: '''Vaxall''', also known as '''Vaxall of the Dying Gaze''' and as '''Xavlal''' to the [[Zhentarim]], was one of the oldest [[beholder]]s in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Relationships: Vaxall was a lesser agent of the [[Twisted Rune]]. Vaxall had many minions, among them its elite servants:  the [[battle horror]] [[Gauntlet (battle horror)|Gauntlet]], the [[flameskull]] [[Skullpyr]] and the [[Doom Brigade]], a company of ten [[Helmed horror]]s.
